title: Vaibhavam Diamond Bangle: A Touch of Tradition
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
features: This bangle showcases intricate filigree work, a hallmark of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The central motif is a traditional sunburst design, adorned with a halo of rubies and sparkling diamonds. Coral beads are delicately placed on either side, adding a touch of auspiciousness. The bangle's openwork design ensures comfortable wear.
colors: complemented by the fiery red of rubies and coral
the lush green of the emerald
and the dazzling white of the diamonds. A vibrant color palette traditionally favored in South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranthi and Ugadi
and special occasions like anniversaries. A statement piece that can also elevate a modern ensemble.
description: This Kada blends timeless design with exceptional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster, while the high-quality gemstones add unmatched brilliance. Its traditional design makes it a cherished heirloom, passed down through generations. Its eye-catching design and color combination exude sophistication.
